task.title: Delete Record
task.shortdesc: Delete a record from an existing session.

step.cmd: Display the record that you would like to delete and choose the Session Delete Record (CMD/CTRL+E) menu item.
step.stepresult: A dialog will appear asking you to confirm that you would like to delete this record and informing you that this action cannot be undone.

step.cmd: If you are unsure, click No. To continue and delete the record, click Yes.
step.stepresult: The record will no longer appear in the Record Data view; the next record will be displayed.
